    • gameStateExists

      public static boolean gameStateExists()
      Returns:
      true if GameState has been initialized

    • gameStateClean

      public static boolean gameStateClean()
      Returns:
      true if GameState has been reset

    • boardNoWorkers

      public static boolean boardNoWorkers​(java.util.List<Coordinates> exclusions)
      Parameters:
      exclusions - list of coordinates to avoid
      Returns:
      true if all positions, not excluded, have no workers

    • boardNoWorkers

      public static boolean boardNoWorkers()
      Returns:
      true if all positions have no workers

    • boardNoBuildings

      public static boolean boardNoBuildings​(java.util.List<Coordinates> exclusions)
      Parameters:
      exclusions - list of coordinates to avoid
      Returns:
      true if all positions, not excluded, have no buildings

    • boardNoBuildings

      public static boolean boardNoBuildings()
      Returns:
      true if all positions have no buildings

    • boardEmpty

      public static boolean boardEmpty()
      Returns:
      true if the board is empty (no workers, no buildings)

    • boardWorkers

      public static boolean boardWorkers​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.List<Coordinates>> input)
      Parameters:
      input - map {username, list of coordinates} to check
      Returns:
      true if there are exactly those workers in those positions

    • boardBuildings

      public static boolean boardBuildings​(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.util.List<Coordinates>> input)
      Parameters:
      input - map {height, list of coordinates} to check
      Returns:
      true if there are exactly those buildings

    • godsAssignments

      public static boolean godsAssignments​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> input)
      Parameters:
      input - map {username, god} to test
      Returns:
      true if there are exactly those players with their gods

    • currentPlayer

      public static boolean currentPlayer​(java.lang.String username)
      Parameters:
      username - expected current player
      Returns:
      true if the current player is username

    • numberOfPlayers

      public static boolean numberOfPlayers​(int numPlayer)
      Parameters:
      numPlayer - expected number of players
      Returns:
      true if the number of players is numPlayer

    • allowedGodsEmpty

      public static boolean allowedGodsEmpty()
      Returns:
      true if allowedGods is empty

    • newTurn

      public static boolean newTurn()
      Returns:
      true if current player's current worker is unlocked and null, and if it's state is not WAIT

    • currentWorker

      public static boolean currentWorker​(Coordinates coord, boolean locked)
      Parameters:
      coord - expected coordinates of the current worker
      locked - if the current player's current worker is locked
      Returns:
      true if the current player's current worker is in the right position and as defined by locked

    • currentState

      public static boolean currentState​(State expected)
      Parameters:
      expected - instance of the state expected for current player
      Returns:
      true if current player's state is the same class as expected

    • stateOptions

      public static boolean stateOptions​(java.util.List<Coordinates> expected)
      Parameters:
      expected - list of coordinates of the positions expected as current state options
      Returns:
      true if there are exactly those options

    • enemiesWrapped

      public static boolean enemiesWrapped​(java.lang.String username)
      Parameters:
      username - username of the player from which the event started
      Returns:
      true if each player, username excluded, is wrapped with his evil god

    • enemiesUnwrapped

      public static boolean enemiesUnwrapped​(java.lang.String username)
      Parameters:
      username - username of the player from which the event started
      Returns:
      true if each player is not wrapped with username's evil god

    • playersUnwrappedAll

      public static boolean playersUnwrappedAll()
      Returns:
      false if any player is wrapped with any evil god
